c772b42fd6a49bc009c818b04c473596fe58a97c.commit.message:
Adding _ and ; to the list of allowed characters within the path component of a URL. _ is definitely allowed and ; is allowed but there are restrictions on its use and we'll need to refactor UrlValidator to properly understand how a ; may be used for path parameterization. This is with reference to #VALIDATOR-204.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/validator/trunk@453784 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
